title: Recreation
description: Fitness, wellness, and recreational facilities included with your tuition.

subcategories.name: Open Knight Climb
subcategories.description_md: Experience UCF’s Odyssey III High Element Course — at night!  Includes high-elements and low-elements courses designed for team-building and leadership development.
subcategories.steps_md:
1. Go to https://ucfrwc.org/ 
2. Please make sure to select Thursday, October 30th below to find our available times!
